column1: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.
Upgrade from t3.2xlarge "On-Demand" Instances to "Convertible Reserved Instances" for 3 years to lower costs. Increased the number of instances from 2 to 8 to serve a larger number of users

Upgrading m4.10xlarge instances from "On Demand" to "Convertible Reserved Instances" for 3 years to reduce costs. Increased the number of instances from 2 to 8 to serve a larger number of users and lower latency in requests.
Upgrade RDS instances from db.m5.2xlarge to db.m5.8xlarge and increase the amount of storage from 1TB to 5TB. This update will enable faster CRUD operations and support more users and storage.
